definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: SETTING Department of Operation Surgery Union Hospital Affiliated to Tongji Medical College of Huazhong University of Science and Technology.
sentences.chinese: 華中科技大學同濟醫學院附屬協和醫院手外科。

sentences.english: Recently, a professor of Hua Zhong University of Science and tecnology made a survey.
sentences.chinese: 最近，華中科技大學的一位教授做了一次調查。

sentences.english: I come from HUST, majoring in foreign linguistics and applied linguistics.
sentences.chinese: 我來自華中科技大學，主修外國語言學及應用語言學。

sentences.english: In 1991 he graduated and obtained Doctorate Degree in Huazhong University of Science and Technology.
sentences.chinese: 1991年畢業於華中科技大學，獲工學博士學位。

sentences.english: Zhang Jinsong got his doctorate degree from Huazhong University of Science and Technology.
sentences.chinese: 張勁松，華中科技大學工學博士，高級工程師。

sentences.english: Today most parts of Central China will have thundershowers.
sentences.chinese: 今天華中大部分地區有雷陣雨。

sentences.english: That is because the heavy snows that have been accumulating in central China were falling on places far out of the spotlight.
sentences.chinese: 那是因爲華中積聚的大雪降落在遠離聚光燈的地方。

sentences.english: Design of Coach Vacuum Toilet Electrocircuit and Standard Study on the Components;
sentences.chinese: 華中科技大學環境工程系開發了長途客車真空衛生間。

sentences.english: Pai maneuvered himself into a strategic position in Central China and became commander of the government's defense at Hankow.
sentences.chinese: 白崇禧設法混到漢口擔任華中剿匪總司令的要職。

sentences.english: I was educated at Huazhong University of Science and Technology and have got an MBA.
sentences.chinese: 我畢業於華中理工大學，獲得工商管理碩士學位。

sentences.english: In central and northern China, paper-cut is used to decorate windows.
sentences.chinese: 在華中和華北，簡直用於裝飾窗戶。

sentences.english: Institute of Computer Networks and Communication Technology CCNU, WuHan 430079, China.
sentences.chinese: 華中師範大學計算機網絡與通信研究所。

sentences.english: Graduated from Huazhong University of Science and Technology, China. Dr.

sentences.english: Rats were offered by the Experimental Animal Center of Tongji Medical College, Huazhong University of Science and Technology.

sentences.english: Tu is a native of Wuhan in central China who lives in Beijing alone.
sentences.chinese: 塗出生在華中地區的武漢，現在獨自在北京生活。

sentences.english: It has become the greatest farm machinery exchange fair of the center China area.
sentences.chinese: 成爲華中地區最大規模農機的訂貨會。

definition: (military) strategic town/(fig.) major center (for commerce, culture or tourism etc)
abbr. for Shaanxi 陝西|陕西 province
